title: Exchange Students Experience Sharing Session【 Netherlands&Germany&Czech】
department: 國際事務處國際學生組
author: 陳良愛
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際學生組 - 陳良愛 - issa@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校學生
標題： Exchange Students Experience Sharing Session【 Netherlands&Germany&Czech】
日期： Fri, 3 May 2024 00:00:12 +0800

	For this session of the overseas exchange student sharing session, the International Office cordially invites students who have just returned from overseas exchange programs to share their experiences at sister schools such as HZ University of Applied Sciences in the Netherlands, Justus Liebig University Giessen in Germany, and the University of Pardubice in the Czech Republic.
The event promises to be exciting and enriching, and we encourage all students to seize this opportunity to participate.

Event Date: May 3, 2024 (Friday) 12:10-13:55
★★★ GOOGLE MEET Meeting Link: https://meet.google.com/kcd-sfny-gmk ★★★

Please note:

Before entering the meeting room, please mute your microphone. During the sharing session, it is also essential to keep the microphone muted to avoid audio interference and ensure the smooth progress of the event.
There will be a Q&A session during the event for students to ask questions. Please use the raise hand function when speaking during this time.
